attributes.action: Allow all Bells to be able to ring out from Churches, Community;s  Retreat Houses, Cathedrals, and not come under Noise Pollution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see our heritage returned back to England. We feel that in the last 20 or so years so much of our past cultures, sports, hobbies, way of life has been lost.

Part of this is bell ringing, and the sounds of bells coming from Abbeys,monastic communities, 
Retreat Houses, Churches and Cathedrals.

Bells should be able to ring out and not be subject to attack from
Noise Pollution officers.

Bells ring out not just for services but for joyfull and sad occassions and this should be allowed to happen.

Please sign our petition.

Thank You.
